official_title: A bill to establish a national commission on neighborhoods.

summary.text: National Neighborhood Policy Act - Establishes a National Commission on Neighborhoods which will include two members each from the House and the Senate and 16 public members appointed by the President. States the duties of the Commission which include studying the factors contributing to the decline of city neighborhoods and the factors necessary to neighborhood survival and revitalization. Directs the Commission to make recommendations for modification of existing laws and policies. Makes provisions for the administration of this Commission. Authorizes to be appropriated funds necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish a national commission on neighborhoods.
